mapper.select: SELECT distinct course_type courseType FROM courses

SELECT course_seq courseSeq, manager_id managerId, course_number courseNumber, academy_location academyLocation, course_name courseName, course_start_date courseStartDate, course_end_date courseEndDate, subject, course_type courseType, total_training_days totalTrainingDays, training_hours_of_date trainingHoursOfDate, professor_name professorName, max_students maxStudents, is_active isActive FROM courses WHERE course_seq = #{courseSeq} and is_active = true

SELECT course_seq courseSeq, manager_id managerId, course_number courseNumber, academy_location academyLocation, course_name courseName, course_start_date courseStartDate, course_end_date courseEndDate, subject, course_type courseType, total_training_days totalTrainingDays, training_hours_of_date trainingHoursOfDate, professor_name professorName, max_students maxStudents, is_active isActive FROM courses WHERE course_number = #{courseNumber} and is_active = true

SELECT course_seq courseSeq, manager_id managerId, course_number courseNumber, academy_location academyLocation, course_name courseName, course_start_date courseStartDate, course_end_date courseEndDate, subject, course_type courseType, total_training_days totalTrainingDays, training_hours_of_date trainingHoursOfDate, professor_name professorName, max_students maxStudents, is_active isActive FROM courses WHERE is_active = true and (IF(#{courseNumber}, 0,'전체') = '전체' or course_number = #{courseNumber}) AND (#{academyLocation} IS NULL OR #{academyLocation} = '' or academy_location =#{academyLocation}) and (false = #{excludeExpired} OR course_end_date > CURDATE()) ORDER BY course_number LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(course_seq) FROM courses WHERE is_active = true and (IF(#{courseNumber}, 0,'전체') = '전체' or course_number = #{courseNumber}) AND (#{academyLocation} IS NULL OR #{academyLocation} = '' or academy_location =#{academyLocation}) and (false = #{excludeExpired} OR course_end_date > CURDATE())
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO courses (manager_id, course_number, academy_location, course_name, course_start_date, course_end_date, subject, course_type, total_training_days, training_hours_of_date, professor_name, max_students) values (#{managerId}, #{courseNumber}, #{academyLocation}, #{courseName}, #{courseStartDate}, #{courseEndDate}, #{subject}, #{courseType}, #{totalTrainingDays}, #{trainingHoursOfDate}, #{professorName}, #{maxStudents})
mapper.update: update courses set is_active = false where course_seq = #{courseSeq};
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(course_end_date, '%Y') AS courseEndYear FROM courses GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(course_end_date, '%Y') ORDER BY courseEndYear desc
